name: ai-bangladesh-address-parser
description: Production-grade AI-powered Bangladeshi address parser - Extract house, road, area, district, postal code, and more from full addresses

scripts.postinstall: python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt --quiet 2>/dev/null || python -m pip install -r requirements.txt --quiet 2>/dev/null || echo 'Note: Install Python dependencies manually: pip install -r requirements.txt'
scripts.install-python-deps: python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt || python -m pip install -r requirements.txt
